scripts/optimize-images.js(ç”»åƒç¸¦æ¨ªã‚µã‚¤ã‚ºæœ€é©åŒ–ã‚¹ã‚¯ãƒªãƒ—ãƒˆ)
const sharp = require(`sharp`)
const glob = require(`glob`)
const fs = require(`fs`)
// æœ€é©åŒ–ã—ãŸã„ç”»åƒã®ãƒ‘ã‚¹ã‚’æ­£è¦è¡¨ç¾ã§æŒ‡å®š
const matches = glob.sync(`src/pages/**/*.{png,jpg,jpeg}`)
// Retinaã‚’è€ƒæ…®ã—2å€ã«ã™ã‚‹
const MAX_WIDTH = 800 * 2

Promise.all(
  matches.map(async match => {
    const stream = sharp(match)
    const info = await stream.metadata()

    if (info.width <= MAX_WIDTH) {
      return
    }

    // ç”»åƒå¹…ã‚’MAX_WIDTHã¾ã§ç¸®å°ã—ã¦ä¸Šæ›¸ã
    const outputBuffer = await stream.resize(MAX_WIDTH).toBuffer()
    fs.writeFileSync(match, outputBuffer)
    console.log(`success resize markdown image. ${info.width} -> ${MAX_WIDTH}, ${match}`)

    return 'Success'
  })
)

å†™çœŸã¯ç„¡é§„ã«é«˜ç”»è³ªã§ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚µã‚¤ã‚ºãŒå¤§ãããªã‚ŠãŒã¡ã§ã™ã€‚ ã“ã®å ´åˆã€imageminã‚’ä½¿ã£ã¦ç”»åƒã®ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚µã‚¤ã‚ºã‚’åœ§ç¸®ã—ã¾ã—ã‚‡ã†ã€‚ ä»¥ä¸‹ã®ã‚ˆã†ãªã‚¹ã‚¯ãƒªãƒ—ãƒˆã‚’å®šç¾©ã—ã¦ã€package.jsonã«compressImagesã®ã‚ˆã†ãªnpm scriptsã‚’å®šç¾©ã—ã¾ã—ã‚‡ã†ã€‚ jpegã¯imagemin-mozjpegã€pngã¯imagemin-pngquantã‚’ä½¿ãˆã°ç”»è³ªã‚’ãã‚Œã»ã©è½ã¨ã™ã“ã¨ãªãåœ§ç¸®ã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚

scripts/compress-images(ç”»åƒãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚µã‚¤ã‚ºæœ€é©åŒ–ã‚¹ã‚¯ãƒªãƒ—ãƒˆ)
const glob = require(`glob`);
const fs = require(`fs`);
const path = require("path");
const imagemin = require('imagemin');
const imageminMozjpeg = require('imagemin-mozjpeg');
const imageminPngquant = require('imagemin-pngquant');

const addSizeInfo = (filePath) => {
  const state = fs.statSync(filePath);
  return {
    size: state.size,
    filePath
  }
};


(async () => {
  const matchesThumbnail = glob.sync(`src/images/thumbnail/**/*.{png,jpg,jpeg}`);
  const matchesPage = glob.sync(`src/pages/**/*.{png,jpg,jpeg}`);

  [...matchesThumbnail, ...matchesPage].map(addSizeInfo).forEach(async(factor) => {
    const filePath = factor.filePath;
    const fileDir = path.dirname(filePath)
    const fileExt = path.extname(filePath)

    if(['.png'].includes(fileExt)) {

      await imagemin([filePath], {
        destination: fileDir, // overwrite
        plugins: [
          imageminPngquant()
        ]
      });

      const compressedSize = fs.statSync(filePath).size;    
      console.log(`${factor.size} -> ${compressedSize} ${filePath}`);  

    } else if(['.jpg','.jpeg'].includes(fileExt)){

      await imagemin([filePath], {
        destination: fileDir, // overwrite
        plugins: [
          imageminMozjpeg()
        ]
      });

      const compressedSize = fs.statSync(filePath).size;    
      console.log(`${factor.size} -> ${compressedSize} ${filePath}`);  
    } else {
      console.log("Can't optimize", filePath)
    }
  })
})();

const striptags = require('striptags');

const Parser = require('rss-parser');
const parser = new Parser({

});

const INTERNAL_TYPE_BLOG = 'blog';

  const blogUrls = ['rss-url-1', 'rss-url-2', ];

  for(const blogUrl of blogUrls) {
  
    // rss-parserã§RSSæƒ…å ±ã‚’å–å¾—ã™ã‚‹
    const feed = await parser.parseURL(blogUrl).then(feed => {

      return {
        ...feed,
        items: feed.items.map(item => ({
          title: item.title,
          excerpt: excerpt(item.content, 120),
          content: item.content,

  const rssPosts = feeds.map(feed => feed.items).reduce((a,b) => [...a, ...b]);

  // Promise.allã§ã‚„ã‚‹ã¨503ã«ãªã‚‹ã®ã§foræ–‡ã‚’ä½¿ã†

  // é‡è¤‡ã‚’è€ƒæ…®ã—ã¦ãƒ¦ãƒ‹ãƒ¼ã‚¯ã«ã—ã¦ã‹ã‚‰å‡¦ç†ã™ã‚‹
  const imageUrls = _uniq(rssPostsWithImageUrl.filter(p => p.imageUrl).map(p => p.imageUrl));

  await Promise.all(imageUrls.map(async imageUrl => {

  rssPostsWithImageUrl.forEach(p => {

      .digest('hex');
    
    const excerpt = 
    actions.createNode({
      ...p,

// è¨˜äº‹è¦ç´„ã¯è¨˜äº‹æœ¬æ–‡ã‹ã‚‰æŠ½å‡º
function excerpt(html, maxLength) {
  const rowText = striptags(html, '<pre>')
    .replace(/<pre[\s\S]+?>[\s\S]+?<\/pre>/g, '')
    .replace(/\n/g, '')
    .replace(/ /g, '')
    .trim();
  return rowText.length >= maxLength
    ? rowText.substring(0, maxLength) + '...'
    : rowText;
}

export default new Vuex.Store({
  state: {
    pagination: {
      page: 1,
      rowsPerPage: 20,
      sortBy: 'id',
      descending: false,
    },
  },

  getter: {
    getPagination: state => state.pagination,
  },

  actions: {
    SAVE_PAGINATION({ commit }, payload) {
      const {
        page,
        rowsPerPage,
        sortBy,
        descending,
      } = payload;

      commit('savePagination', {
        page,
        rowsPerPage,
        sortBy,
        descending,
      });
    },

    SAVE_PAGINATION_PAGE({ commit }, payload) {
      const { page } = payload;
      commit('savePaginationPage', page);
    },
  },

  mutations: {
    savePagination(state, pagination) {
      state.pagination = pagination;
    },
    savePaginationPage(state, page) {
      state.pagination.page = page;
    },
  },
});

<script>
import { mapActions, mapGetters } from 'vuex';

    // ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ãƒãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³å‚ç…§ç”¨
    paginationPage() {      return this.paginationInStore.page;    },    // ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ãƒãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ç”¨ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸æ•°ç®—å‡ºãƒ¡ã‚½ãƒƒãƒ‰
    pages() {

}

const TARGET_POS = ['åè©', 'å‹•è©', 'å½¢å®¹è©']

// kuromoji.jsã®è§£æçµæœã®å€¤ã§ç‰¹ã«å€¤ãŒãªã„å ´åˆã¯ä»¥ä¸‹ã®æ–‡å­—ãŒè¨­å®šã•ã‚Œã‚‹
const NO_CONTENT = '*'

    // ç•¥
